experiences: Through adept navigation of technical challenges, I've developed a resilient backend system for our smart home application. Leveraging Java with Spring Boot, I seamlessly integrated MQTT for device communication and RESTful APIs for frontend interaction. Encapsulating MQTT logic ensured modularity, while robust security measures, including OAuth 2.0 or JWT, managed authentication amidst heavy API and MQTT traffic. Database optimization techniques bolstered performance, while fault-tolerant design patterns ensured reliability in the face of failures. With proactive monitoring, I've delivered a scalable and secure smart home platform, poised for sustained innovation in the IoT landscape.

During my internship, I led the optimization of a monolithic Reverse Auction Web Application's backend infrastructure using Java, SQL, and JSON. I fine-tuned database operations, implemented efficient SQL queries and indexing strategies, and integrated a priority queue data structure for bid management. These efforts significantly improved application responsiveness and user engagement. Additionally, I conducted comprehensive testing using JUnit and Mockito to ensure code quality and reliability. Through this experience, I gained valuable insights into database optimization techniques and their impact on real-world application performance.
